definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Remember, he's a Martian and doesn't keep score the way you do.
sentences.chinese: 謹記，他是火星人，記分法和你不同。

sentences.english: Martians pride themseles in doing things all by themseles.
sentences.chinese: 火星人以自力做事爲榮。

sentences.english: Those who rejected the Martian story from internal evidence.
sentences.chinese: 利用外部證據否定火星人入侵的報道。

sentences.english: Why does human including Marsian hate Uncle Sam?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼人類包括火星人都討厭山姆大叔？

sentences.english: The martian has no genitals , multiply the offspring in a manner to split and breed .
sentences.chinese: 火星人沒有生殖器官，以分裂繁殖的方式繁衍後代。

sentences.english: When the Venusians were ready to receive, the Martians were ready to give.
sentences.chinese: 當金星人準備接受，火星人也會準備好給與。

sentences.english: It was not difficult to tell that these were the leaders of the green Martians.
sentences.chinese: 很顯然他們都是這些綠火星人的頭領。

sentences.english: The Martian headphones are already made.
sentences.chinese: 火星人的耳機已經造出來了。

sentences.english: This was the earthman compared to the Martian happier.
sentences.chinese: 這就是地球人比火星人更幸福的所在了。

sentences.english: The movie is about between the Martian and earthman's matter.
sentences.chinese: 影片是關於火星人與地球人之間的事。

sentences.english: If Benitez is sacked, the FA will be bracing themselves for an approach for Fabio Capello from Inter.
sentences.chinese: 如果瘟胖被解僱，足總將面臨國米索要火星人的局面。

sentences.english: How many Martians dye their hair brown ?
sentences.chinese: 有多少火星人將頭髮染成棕色？

sentences.english: The Martians were inspired by the Venusian beauty and culture.
sentences.chinese: 火星人能接受金星人的美麗與文化鼓舞。

sentences.english: Ken and Ann will greet the Martians and tell them they are from Earth.
sentences.chinese: 肯和安會跟火星人打招呼，告訴火星人他們來自地球。

sentences.english: Ken and Ann will greet the Martians and tell them they are from Earth.
sentences.chinese: 肯和安會跟火星人打招呼，告訴火星人他們來自地球。

definition: celestial body (e.g. planet, satellite etc)/heavenly body
Star Trek (US TV and film series)
